title: 89/8/EEC: Commission Decision of 14 December 1988 amending Decision 79/542/EEC as regards imports of fresh meat of wild cloven-hoofed animals from Botswana, South Africa/Namibia and Swaziland
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 14 December 1988
amending Decision 79/542/EEC as regards imports of fresh meat of wild cloven-hoofed animals from Botswana, South Africa/Namibia and Swaziland
(89/8/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 79/542/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision shall apply from 1 January 1989.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 December 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 124, 18. 5. 1988, p. 31.
(3) OJ No L 146, 14. 6. 1979, p. 15.
(4) OJ No L 243, 28. 8. 1986, p. 34.
